Now before I start telling the stats. of all the monsters I have to tell all the ones that have read all my "The Destroyer And The Savior" Stories that I made a mistake in the 1st Chapter of the 3 Chapters.The name of the villain monster is Annuvin.Not Gargantus but Annuvin,ANNUVIN!!!!!!Now back to the main subject of these messages.Now here are the stats. for the 1st Chapter.I will continue the stats. for the other chapters as I go on and remember what the events are.So here's the Chapter 1 stats.
